location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Abraham Hojel Nickson, Bombay to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Hojel's having received confirmation of his position as Residency Surgeon and that the medical authorities are refusing to let him leave as they cannot replace him.The letter also discusses Hojel's intention of travelling to Poona [Pune] to thank the Governor of Bombay for the appointment and to get the situation resolved.
